files.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />

    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.9.0/p5.js"></script>
    <!-- <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.9.0/addons/p5.sound.min.js"></script> -->

    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://molab-itp.github.io/p5moRelease/lib/66/style.css"></script>
    <!-- <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../../p5moLibrary/src/lib/style.css?v=63" /> -->

    <style></style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <main></main>

    <script type="module" src="https://molab-itp.github.io/p5moRelease/lib/70/a_lib.js"></script>
    <!-- <script type="module" src="../../p5moLibrary/src/lib/a_lib.js"></script> -->

    <script src="a_my_init.js"></script>
    <script src="ui_init.js"></script>
    <script src="photo.js"></script>
    <script src="a_sketch.js"></script>
    <!-- ?v=63 included to force into the cache -->
  </body>
</html>
